body.p: Synopsys Bridge offers multiple logging and diagnostic options.

section.title: Logging
section.p:
Synopsys Bridge offers multiple logging options.
Pass --json-log to output JSON format logs.
Pass --json-log-file to enable JSON format logs in the bridge.log file in the Synopsys Bridge home directory .

Synopsys Bridge also provides logs in adapters, with five log levels:
DEBUG
INFO
WARNING
ERROR
FATAL

section.title: Diagnostics
section.p:
To enable Synopsys Bridge diagnostics mode, pass a --diagnostics command line option. This:
Enables debug logs.
Passes additional arguments to configured tools which creates additional diagnostics artifacts/logs from these tools under the Synopsys Bridge home directory.
Creates a diagnostics.json file containing the final state data inside the Synopsys Bridge home directory, but masking sensitive information like tokens and passwords.
